# [Interview #1113: WOR-London, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1113#4)

#### Question

What would happen if you made a cup of tea from the Flowers of Edgli?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You would have a very interesting cup of tea.
